nodes.text: Doelsor Triggant was an individual who served as a Moff of the Galactic Empire. By 10 BBY, Triggant had gifted crime lord Dryden Vos—head of the Crimson Dawn syndicate—a Taozin grub, which Vos kept on display in the study of his personal yacht, the First Light.
Doelsor Triggant was first mentioned in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, a 2018 reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo.
